properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Crockett, TN; Dyer, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 9:59AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
South Fork of the Forked Deer River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the South Fork of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* from Thursday January 2 until further notice.
* At 9 AM Wednesday the stage was...8.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 11.5 feet on Friday, January 3.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* Forecast to hold steady through Thursday morning, then rise above
flood stage Thursday afternoon with a flat crest near 11.5 feet
through the weekend.
At 11.5 feet, farm land near the river is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
